dynaForm.PRO_VALIDATE_TITLE: SELECT PRO_UID FROM PROCESS INNER JOIN CONTENT ON (CONTENT.CON_ID = PROCESS.PRO_UID) WHERE CON_LANG = @@SYS_LANG AND CON_VALUE = TRIM(@@PRO_TITLE) Title
